title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions       Northern Indiana Tourism Delightful attractions wait beyond the sandy beach shoreline of the Indiana Dunes. Surrounding communities offer an immeasurable amount of extraordinary restaurants, shopping, nightlife, hotels, and recreational activities. We suggest that you take a look at the following web sites to plan a visit that's just right for you.      Indiana Dunes Tourism Located at the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Visitor Center (219) 926-2255 office info@indianadunes.com website Northern Indiana Tourism Development Commission (574) 862-1434 office nitdc@frontier.com website Indiana Dunes Tourism (219) 926-2255 office info@indianadunes.com website City of Portage Portage Lakefront & Riverwalk (219) 762-5425 office webmaster@ci.portage.in.us website Town of Beverly Shores (219) 728-6531 office beverlyshores.clerk@gmail.com website Indiana Dunes State Park (219) 926-1952 office website       LaPorte County LaPorte County Convention & Visitor Bureau (219) 872-5055 office (219) 326-8115 office website Michigan City website      Lake County South Shore Convention & Visitors Authority (219) 989-7979 office website Miller Beach - A Neighborhood of Gary, Indiana  steve@spicerweb.org website
